message: 200 really isn't wide enough. 256 works better.

message: Add the multi-panel view.

title: Bigger spacing on large screens. Looks better.
message: Bigger spacing on large screens. Looks better.

title: Give credit where credit is due.
message: Give credit where credit is due.

title: Instead of using a background, use EnvelopeDetailsActivity's method. More…
message: Instead of using a background, use EnvelopeDetailsActivity's method. More efficient, by using less overdraw.

title: Add some padding between the bottom axis labels and the graph.
message:
Add some padding between the bottom axis labels and the graph.

Otherwise, if we have an envelope on a long time low level, its graph
line will overlap with the axis a bit.

title: Make the graph background transparent.
message:
Make the graph background transparent.

That way, when touching it, the highlight color is shown on all of the
box instead of just on the borders.

title: Fix mistranslation.
message:
Fix mistranslation.

Hora means "time" as in "hour", but we need something similar to "date"
instead.

title: Do not show "Balance" when scrolling the list of envelopes.
message:
Do not show "Balance" when scrolling the list of envelopes.

By setting a background, we effectively let it hide below the list of
envelopes, instead of letting it show up when scrolling in the space
between envelopes.

between envelopes.
